'''Tiabo''' is a character in {{poe2}}. He is found near the entrance to the second floor of the [Spire of the Soul-Seers](/spireOfTheSoulSeers/).

## Background

An animancer selling related wares in The Sacred Stair.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           = Various potions and alchemy ingredients, including [The Amazing and Truly Incredible Instant Potion Belt](/theAmazingAndTrulyIncredibleInstantPotionBelt/), [Okura's Kettle](/okurasKettle/) and [Animancy Cat](/animancyCat/).
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

[Category:The Sacred Stair characters](/categoryTheSacredStairCharacters/)
